name: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
description: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch is a TV movie starring Fionn Whitehead, Craig Parkinson, and Alice Lowe. A young programmer starts to question reality when he adapts a mad writer's fantasy novel into a video game.

review.name: Some people are missing the point
review.reviewBody:
The fact that the film pushes you in to a specific path is the entire point of the film!

The idea that we are all brainwashed and that free will is up for debate in any choice we make in today's society is, by its very purpose, the whole concept of the film.

I thought is was a brilliant new step in film making and an incredible concept. Would highly recommend to any open-minded individual with good taste in film and a love for science fiction and 80's vibes.

trailer.name: Official Trailer
trailer.description: In 1984, a young programmer begins to question reality as he adapts a sprawling fantasy novel into a video game and soon faces a mind-mangling challenge. Welcome back. A "Black Mirror" event.

Title: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
